Introduction

Yujin is a South Korean singer, dancer, and actress under WAKEONE.

In 2014, Yujin worked as a backup dancer for G.NA during her promotions for "G.NA's Secret".

On March 19, 2015, Yujin debuted as a member of the girl group CLC under Cube Entertainment with the mini album "First Love". On May 20, 2022, Cube announced that CLC's official activities concluded. Despite not being active under Cube anymore, the members of CLC have confirmed that the group didn't disband and that they were open to coming back as a group when the time comes.

On June 7, 2021, Yujin was announced as a contestant on the Mnet survival show "Girls Planet 999". During the show's finale, she ranked third overall, thus making her a member of the project girl group Kep1er. On January 3, 2022, Kep1er debuted with their first mini album "First Impact" and the title track "WA DA DA".

Sometime in mid-2022, Yujin was removed from Cube Active Artists contract list. This confirms that she has departed from the agency after 11 years. She is also not listed as an artist or actress on Cube's website.

On May 30, 2024, it was announced that Yujin had renewed her contract with WAKEONE and will continue to promote with Kep1er.

Fun facts

1
Yujin is the original creator of the 'Gwiyomi' trend. She taught it to all the trainees from Cube, including her senior BTOB's Ilhoon, who later did it on the show "Weekly Idol" where it became viral.
…
2
Yujin's face is so small that she could cover it with a CD.
…
3
Yujin's fandom name picked by Korean fans is 아토단 (baby bunny team).
…
4
Yujin attended the "Hanlim Multi Art School," where she studied with actor Ahn Hyoseop and Stray Kids' Bang Chan, who said during a vlive that he's thankful towards her because she took good care of him.
…
5
Yujin's hobbies are doing pilates and watching any movie.
…
6
Yujin's English name is Lily.
